I was the only Black Women in my graduating 2017 Physics class.

So I’m rooting hard for @BlackinPhysics 

#Blackinphysics #Blackinphysicsrollcall

content:
Hi 👋🏾 so I'm Chaneil.

I have a BSc in Earth Sciences (geophysics based). My final project was titled "The evolution of Mercurys core" focusing on the thermochemical evolution of the planet & its magnetic field. I am currently a MSc Astrophysics student. 

#BlackInPhysicsRollCall https://t.co/4Vl9qvPbaJ

Though I may not be a physicist 😆 I am where I am thanks to physics!

content:
Hi Everyone! My name is Tamia. I'm a physicist, & artist. My research background is in PER focusing on the intersection of physics identity & the performing arts. I use theatre and visual arts to promote creativity in physics/science.
